short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the home size level breakdown from a realtor.ca listing page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of getting a calculator out and manually adding up every room in the house in realtor.ca?

If yes... then this handy tool is for you!

Calculate the total size of the home, plus each separate level. Just open the extension while browsing a listing page of your choosing.
